name: Super Bomberman 3
description: Super Bomberman 3 (スーパーボンバーマン3, Sūpā Bonbāman Surī) is a game released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1995. It is the third game in the Bomberman series for the system. Just like Fifa International Soccer, up to five players can play at the same time.The game was released in Japan and the PAL region, but not in North America.
